claims.claim: Formerly incarcerated individuals struggle with basic technology skills upon reentry.
claims.quote: Technology. It was, it was a, it was real tough because I didn't even know how to use the telephone. [...] But then COVID came up, shut the class down.

claims.claim: COVID-19 has disrupted educational opportunities for technology adaptation for formerly incarcerated people.
claims.quote: But, so I went to a class, I was able to get in the class, but then COVID came up, shut the class down.

claims.claim: Access to free technology training classes is essential for successful reintegration of formerly incarcerated individuals.
claims.quote: And they know that this is something that you're not able to do coming from where you came from. So they should have those classes already for you. [...] you shouldn't have to pay to go.

claims.claim: Support from younger family members is crucial for the tech education of reentering citizens.
claims.quote: Then my granddaughters was able to assist me further because they kids are tech savvy.
